title: VA - 20 Years Of Golden Hits From Around The World
description:
[i]This is one of those releases you must have in your collection. Don't take Big Papi's word for it. Check it out and then leave a comment. Big Papi ain;t gonna steer you wrong. A fairly difficult to find CD set and is nicely mastered.

Oh yeah, have not yet hooked up scanner so the album art is from the web not the normal Big Papi home grown scan.

- Big Papi
[/i]
